website_summaries.verdict: Classic thong-style shower sandals get a durable upgrade in this style from Vertico.
pros: One piece, so no crevices for mold
cons: May have a rubbery odor upon arrival, but this fades quickly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gym Shower!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gym shower. I have tried Nike & Under Armour slides, along with others. These are almost dry before I even put them in my bag. They do not smell or make my bad damp. Usually I was a 10-11 with plenty of room. These are an 11 and fit pretty snug, so they run kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Russel Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stiff and uncomfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most uncomfortable sandal I have ever worn. It might be due to the material of the sandals, they are extremely "stiff". I thought they would become more "flexible" and comfortable after months of wearing, but that wasn't the case. It was still extremely uncomfortable and I'm so angry after discarding it, I feel the need to write this review. I don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: WCC

customer_reviews.title: Not wide feet...
customer_reviews.text: these sandals seem adequate for the gym, which is why i purchased them, however they are rather stiff and probably not your lounging type of sandal. More importantly, for potential buyers with moderate to fairly wide feet, it should be noted that these flip flops are narrow. Due to their rigidity and stiffness of the plastic material of which they are constructed, there is no possibility for wearing them in or achieving expansion. They are narrow enough where going up a size will likely not work for you if you have significantly wide feet. In sum, they run narrow and thus i had to return 'em. Hope this helps....
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Why did they bother making these
customer_reviews.text: First off, these run small... Very small... I wear a size 12 in nearly every shoe brand on the market. So I purchased a size 12 and my heel is hanging off the back of these sandals. These sandals are nearly 1" shorter than any of my other size 12 sandals. They are also incredibly stiff, so the portion that goes between your toes is very uncomfortable. Unfortunately I missed my return window, so I'm stuck with these things.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used only for the shower at my gym. I did not want to pay $40 for Nike or Adidas, considering the use, and I am happy I got this. They fit exactly right, and they are actually better than the Adidas I used to have, meaning, these dry super quickly. The old Adidas, for which I paid around $30, stayed wet most of the time, they cracked, the color went away after a couple of months, and bottomline, it was a waste of my money. These are perfect. Again, all I need this is for the shower. They are very comfortable and the price is great. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: So... the shower sandals are great for the intended purpose. They are an inexpensive, but well-made sandal with great wet traction. Since the top strap is molded into the shoe, I don't see if ever breaking. My ONLY complaint is that the US Size 13 shoe was a little bit too small--slightly short, and slightly tight. Too small for me to want to wear them regularly for their intended purpose. I wish they made a 14! However, the customer service was so good and responsive, that I give this product 5 stars regardless. Just be sure to order up if you have any questions (and you don't have a size 13 foot)!
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and too small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sandals were too small and much too narrow for my foot. The rubber between the toes was extremely bothersome so I returned them. My foot is a size 12 and I was fearful of ordering a size larger because of the shape of the sandal and the narrowness. I ordered a pair of Showaflops in my size and they are GREAT 👍 albeit more expensive but worth it in every way. Adjustable so I can fit my foot and switch to socks easily and no between the toe wear.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NOT WORTH THE COST, THEY ARE SO CHEAP. THEY FALL APART IN TWO WEEKS.
customer_reviews.text: WHEN I REC. THE ITEM, THE SANDAL DID NOT HAVE A SUPPORT, OR SOLE, THE SOLE IS JUST TO THIN, FOR THE COST I PAY FOR IT, SOME STORE THAT SELL THIS TYPE OF SANDAL, HAS MORE OF A SOLE, AND SUPPORT FOR THE SAME COST THAT I PAY FOR THIS SANDAL. THE COMPANY SHOULD TELL PEOPLE ABOUT THIS SANDAL NOT HAVING AN SUPPORT, AND THE SOLE IS VERY THIN. I WEAR SANDAL EVERY DAY LIVING IN FLORIDA, THESE SANDAL WILL LAST ABOUT TWO MONTHS. (WARNING)THEY ARE SO THIN, YOU CAN FALL DOWN, AND BREAK YOUR BONES.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL SINGLETON

customer_reviews.title: Since they are very lightweight and don't soak up water which is great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I wear 10 1/2 women's shoe and needed a very lightweight shower shoe that would dry quickly and not soak up water. Nothing in the women's dept matched so I tried these. I ordered a 9 which I wear in men's shoes but the fit is slightly longer and wider than a 9 - are 11 inches long and weigh 6.1 oz. Since they are very lightweight and don't soak up water which is great for travel, I am not returning. You also need to de-gas them outside a few days when you remove from the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size I usually get in flopflops and/or shoes, but these were too small and narrow for my feet. They are stiff and uncomfortable, but I have to realize that they are intended only for shower or spa, definitely not to walk in. They are a nice color of black. They have a strong chemical odor, which I figure will dissipate after wearing. I wanted to like these, but I am going to return them. They are just not for me, but may be for others.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Moon

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For...But These Are Toxic
customer_reviews.text: I could not even take these fully out of the package without being overwhelmed by the most volatile chemical fumes. I wanted to use these as “throw away” one time use shower shoes for when I was in the hospital giving birth. I did not want to use my good flip flops. I could not get by the smell. These made me sick. I had two other people also smell them...they could not believe the odor. Imagine placing these toxic shoes on your skin? The skin is the largest organ and it absorbs everything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Casale

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to wear in our gym showers since the thought of walking on that floor barefoot, not going to happen. These shoes fit well. Can't stand flips where one's feet slide around inside when wet, but these do not. Feet stay secure, even if I soap up the bottoms while in the shower. Doesn't pool any water in the shoe either. Also the tile in the locker rooms can be slick with bare feet, but these shoes make if almost slip free. They don't absorb any water, so dry super quick. Price is right. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Dewster

customer_reviews.title: Non-Slip & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the shower and pool. They're a bit more stiff than traditional (read as: cheap) flip-flops, and dry really quickly. I'm between a size 9 and 10, so got the 10 and they fit just right, with a little extra room so I don't overhang. The inner and bottom texture is good to prevent slips, and kind of feels like one of those nubby massage balls. Opted for the blue because black is boring - it's a good, dark, cornflower blue. The center toe-thong is fine. I don't usually like them, but in this case I feel like it helps them stay on and prevent slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rubber Sandal.Easy dry after shower.I am most of using at fitness center after exercise .Furthermore perfact fit with my foot. Easy to walk and light weight.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool sandal: no-slip!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a no-slip flip-flop for the shower and pool, and this is it! It's a single-piece molded foam-plastic-rubber sandal that's extremely light but seems durable. The dark blue is a perfect match for the Speedo Endurance racer of the same color. Runs narrow and a little small; maybe 1/2-size smaller than my normal 11. It is slightly springy but does not absorb water. The foot-bed is pleasantly contoured, which makes it very comfortable; the only minor downside is that you can't easily kick them off. Outstanding value: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Likes regular stuff

customer_reviews.title: Short life span.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very light, take some getting used to. They have a cheap feel to them. They dry fast and grip well on wet surfaces. They could grip better but compared to the slippery garbage sold in stores these are great! The biggest con is their longevity; they only lasted 11 months before a thong snapped. Update: 06-2019 Purchased these twice and twice the thong broke within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kamakiriad

customer_reviews.title: I’d rather have fungus on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra $8 and get an adidas sandal. These are horrendous. Runs slightly small, and that’s the pro. Cons are everything else you can dream of. Material is hard plastic with no give. It’s like your walking on recycled baby diaper hamper plastic. I don’t know how anyone could give a good review. You’re better off wearing plastic bags with a rubber band around the ankle. You could maybe even glue cardboard to that for traction. Buy something else. Trust me. I bought these to save money for a cheap shower sandal. I’ll take my chances barefoot and hope my health insurance covers penicillin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flops.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the rubbery feel, sometimes these don't want to let your foot slip out. Otherwise, they are pretty awesome. Light weight. Durable. Very comfortable. Can be worn as shower shoes or out and about. These take a beating. They will last a while under lots of abuse. I'm deployed to Kuwait and used these several times a day over all sorts of terrain around my billet...rocks, sand, cement, etc.
customer_reviews.author: biscuit baseball

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: These shower sandals are attractive and lightweight. The fit is true to size. The sizing chart online recommended that I order a size 12. I mistakenly ordered a size 11 and they fit perfectly. I am not usually that lucky. They do not absorb any water so they dry quickly. They are great for travel and for use in public showers. I took away one star because I feel they are a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Great product, light weight and dries fast
customer_reviews.text: i love these and use them as gym sandals for the shower. why do i love these: 1) they are very light weight, important for me as i carry them in my gym bag and want to keep the weight down 2) they dry extremely fast, again important for me as i put them back in my bag a few minutes after showering. I just go over them with towel and they are 100% dry immediately 3) they are comfortable, again i dont wear them for extended periods of time but totally fine for short term wearing in shower
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: The best shower sandals that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best shower sandal that I have owned. The closed cell foam means that it does not retain dirty water from public showers. As a result, it does not squish and leave wet shoeprints behind once you have left the locker room, either. The thong is made of the same material, and it feels like it is molded as one unit, as opposed to having the strap fused on afterwards. The sandals themselves will wear out long before the bit that goes between your toes rips out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Narrow feet only
customer_reviews.text: For extremely skinny feet only. If you have wide or close to wide feet, you will find these extremely tight and uncomfortable. My advise is to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: t parkway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just joined a new gym, and I wanted to be able to take advantage of the available showers there, especially if I was working out before a work day. I needed a good new pair of sandals to wear to protect my feet. These work great for that purpose. Very sturdy, and they are not slippery at all. They dry fairly quickly and go right back in my gym bag with ease. I have used these for a month already, 4-5 times a week, and I have had no issues to date!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: nice quality and surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a pair of these for an overseas trip to use while showering on camp sites and I loved them so much I ended up wearing them everywhere. They are super comfortable and sturdy. I bought this pair for my husband after he wore mine and liked them so much he wanted to own a pair too. A++++ if you're looking for an inexpensive but well made sandal.
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Work in public safety and needed a pair of shower shoes to tote around the city and these work very well! I had to wear them around town for a day when I was off duty and found them to be extremely comfortable! I am not sure that I would wear them around town on a regular basis due to a fear of the part that goes between the toes breaking too easily but for short term use I think that they are very adequate. I would gladly buy a new pair once these have worn down!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought these the first time with amazon prime and a week later they never showed up so I clicked return and rebought them. They can in two days like they should. Now these are going to be shower shoes . These look cool feel ok and my son likes them. Weird shipping was the only problem. Oh yheee smell very strongly of rubber so just air them out a bit before using
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Quality Beach/Shower Sandal
customer_reviews.text: My husband's sandals broke during a beach vacation and we needed a replacement in a pinch. These turned out to be so much better than his original sandals. They have good structure and support to them; they feel sturdy yet lightweight. He has a wide foot and they fit him well. They're easy to clean and wipe dry. Exactly what he wanted for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Emily ONeil

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I had expected and form fit to my foot. Comfortable and light weight.. I bought these for shower shoes at the gym or to pool so expectations were very low, but these are great . Only slight concern (not for me personally) is the brand tag piece is pealing back. Everything else is still solid.
customer_reviews.author: REED

customer_reviews.title: perfect for gym showering and walking around the pool
customer_reviews.text: slip-resistant in the showers, even with soap on the tiles! these fit well and keep your feet off the tiles, which is important when you use gym showers - people can be nasty. buy your normal shoe size and they will fit without letting your feet slide around. these are comfortable to wear too. with a little care, like air drying between use, these look like they will last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great shower sandal
customer_reviews.text: I like this shower sandal a lot. I like the fact that they don't start to stink, and they dry out really well for locker storage. The only thing that is somewhat annoying is how hard the rubber is and doesn't seem to loosen up as time goes on. That is a really minor thing and definitely would not keep me from recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good shower shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear flip flops. I am large physical man and flips flops are a bad look and unsafe. These are my "shower shoes". I wear them in the public shower and the walk to the pool. I swim 3 times a week. These shoes fit into my bag and I am good to go. They work well when my feet are wet. They are a good product if used as a shower shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Marcanthony

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The product is made well and it super light. My only problem is I ordered a size 13 and it feels like a size 12. The space between my big toe gets slightly irritated by wearing them due to the material. It's not a bad product at all and I'm wondering maybe because I'm more flat footed that's the reason. Not sure but I can only give it three stars based on my personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these sandals I've bought, and I find them to be both comfortable and durable. Also, they have good arch support. I use them mainly at my gym's pool and in the shower at the gym. They work just fine for poolside and in the shower. I also use one pair around the house. I bought a more well known brand a while back, and they were twice the price and very uncomfortable. I really like the sandals and will buy them again if they are still available when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They are great for not breaking your neck in wet areas
customer_reviews.text: They are great for not breaking your neck in wet areas, but they are not for long-term use because they are for wet areas, not walking in. I want to order another pair for downstairs. They break in and are more comfortable then, still not for long walks. I really like how the part between my toes is permiant and doesn't come apart when I catch them on something causing me to hop around on one foot while putting it back in!
customer_reviews.author: COLIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light.
customer_reviews.text: I like these sandals, the in between toe section is too long for my expectations but maybe that is to keep the top foot straps from rubbing/getting too clingy like happens with some sandals. They’re nice and light. So light I have trouble kicking them off. ALSO, NO LOUD HEEL SLAP, nice and quiet around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fortune, the first

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: chinese size 12 is american size 10. gave them to my niece. The product is lacking in quality BUT The integrity of the seller is beyond reproach.. Product 1 (one) star. Seller 5 (five star). Refunded without product return! He'll yeah.
customer_reviews.author: The Reverend; DR. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Shower sandal feels very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a shower sandal that really does it's work. It feels very lightweight but sturdy, not flimsy. The flip/flop effect is eliminated seemingly by the great fit. So this is a sandal I would recommend to everyone seeking a really good fast drying shower sandal. I ordered men's size 11 and it fit exactly plus comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: blew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wearing for short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be slightly uncomfortable, and would not like to wear them for an extended period of time. However, they work perfectly if you plan to wear them around a locker room, a pool, or anywhere else that you just want to cheaply put something between your feet and the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Cook

customer_reviews.title: Still off gassing after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now and they're still off gassing pretty bad. My dog buries them in the couch and sneezes a lot when shes around them. I bought them to use at the gym sauna but thinking about all the chemicals in the rubber potentially leaching into my skin freaks me out to much to wear them longer than it takes to let my dog into the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Meow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shower.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shower!! I use these at the gym and they are awesome! Dry within minutes and go right back into gym back. Do not retain water in any way. Highly recommended. Just be sure to order one full size bigger as they run small. And they have a weird rubber smell that dissipates after a few day
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F. Mastrande

customer_reviews.title: Good and stable but the toe...
customer_reviews.text: These fit just as expected. The shoe didn't slip in the shower at all. I was completely stable in it. I have one major complaint, which is personal preference. They were painful in between my toes. I put them on and in the warm water they weren’t as bad. Better design there would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Kare

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought a pair years ago, and they were great--comfortable, good support, non-slip, etc. Bought a new pair last week, and they're very different. The material isn't as cushiony, feels slick, and has less arch support. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops do not dry quickly at all and they are dangerous when wet because they retain water due to a raised lip around the bed of the shoe. The manufacturer’s hype is not accurate. Do not use these things in the shower unless you want to risk slipping and falling.
customer_reviews.author: Ping Bull

customer_reviews.title: Great product but toe separator too close to the front edge
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight and seem to be durable and quick-drying. They serve the purpose they are made for. I don't think they would be comfortable for long walks or for use outside the gym shower/spa area. Only complaint is that toes separator is too close to the front, so if you have long toes they might extend beyond the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Ayed

customer_reviews.title: Durrable, cleanable, and even comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ware sandles everyday, and in conditions they are not made for. Despite these being "shower" sandles, i find them very comfortable for everyday abuse and clean up nicely. More then I can say about many I have purchased in the past. Even more surprising, they are comfortable! I would definately buy these again, but their durability boads well for me not having to anytime soon. Grade A!
customer_reviews.author: Nightheron

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fit is too small
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size 11 but that was too small so I ordered a size 12. Well I will be returning that one also as it is too small also. In fact it appeared to be the same size as the pair of 11's I had returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym showers and gym bag.
customer_reviews.text: Usually my flip flops go straight into the gym bag after the shower. My previous pair was more porous and stayed wet inside the bag. After a while it would start to smell and required some maintenance. This pair sheds water really well and can be easily patted dry with a gym towel. So far very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Schlemazl Beerbaum

customer_reviews.title: Quick dry. Durable. Comfortable. Perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: I took these on a 1 year backpacking trip through 15 countries and they were the perfect choice. I wore them to the beach, pool, shower, boat rides, and short hikes. They held up really well and get dry suuuuper fast. It’s amazing how quickly these dry. I just set them upright against a wall or furniture for a few minutes and they are totally dry. Also I have large and very wide feet and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharktongue

customer_reviews.title: Great For Its Intended Purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use at the pool, beach, locker room, public shower area, etc but I would not want to wear them for an extended period of time or take long walks in them. Although the fit is good I wouldn't quite put them in the comfortable category but they do the trick for my purposes. And I think they will clean up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: This product is injections molded and has excess material where the seams of the mold came together and the material leaked out. This left thin, sharp edges right between the toes and under the toes which made these shoes very uncomfortable, almost painful.
customer_reviews.author: Loaded for Bear

customer_reviews.title: Single Molded Shower Slipper
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this as a shower slipper. It has a very solid design and are extremely slip resistant. I love the color and the one-piece molded design increases the sturdiness of the slipper. The slippers of yesterday were not nearly as sturdy as these because the rubber nob near the big toe would pop out after a while. Great product......thx Amazon once again for providing the customer with choices. I would have had to drive all around the city for months to find a slipper like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Troik

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried wearing them a couple of times but the plastic was rather hard and had a seam on one of the things that was just extraordinarily uncomfortable. I threw them away and got some sliders at one of the discount clothing stores for about the same price and am much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower shoe for the gym
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great. They fit as expected, are comfortable, look nice, and are constructed well. They're one piece molded, so they won't have pieces coming apart over time. They don't absorb water. I either let them air dry in my locker or towel them off. Recommend this pair.
customer_reviews.author: LGreen

customer_reviews.title: They okay
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because I have swollen feet they diddnt work so well but ima still use them. Although my foot doesn’t slide on and I thought them being men shoes and size be wide enough but wasn’t for me. All in all does dry fast and I get some more slip when out the shower
customer_reviews.author: chaleah parker

customer_reviews.title: They will work but aren't very comfortable or high quality.
customer_reviews.text: The flip flops will do the job for me. All I need them to do is be a barrier between my feet and the dorm shower floor. However, these flip flops feel quite uncomfortable to me and the do not seem very high quality. One of the logos have already started to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Beachy

customer_reviews.title: Great shower sandals
customer_reviews.text: I originally used the old "flip flops" which ended up being a bit dangerous once wet since they don't stay on your feet. These are comfortable and feel secure enough to walk through the locker room when wet from the pool, sauna, or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The filp flops feels like it is made with very light weight plastic. The description says Rubber Shower filp flops. The material does not have the comfort of rubber slippers as I have used rubber slippers all my life.
customer_reviews.author: Liju

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy
customer_reviews.text: The leftovers from the manufacturing process left a sharp edge of rubber on the strap between the first and second toes. I had to trim it with my utility knife and a fresh blade before it was comfortable enough to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Grampy 11

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for wearing at the gym when training jiu jitsu. They wipe down easy, and they are very affordable. The only gripe I have is they don't slip on and off easy, but that could be a good thing depending on your uses.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great for clumsy folks who occasionally slip in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I'm crazy clumsy and trip in the shower sometimes. These shoes have literally helped me not fall in the soapy tub. They fit perfectly, are true to size and really durable. The bottom has a nice grip and I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering the largest size they have. I have 11.5 to 12 shoe, and this size 12 was almost too small to use. I have a hard time putting them on. Hope the size 13 will be big enough for my 11.5 foot
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym slippers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these slippers for using in the bathroom/shower areas of the gym. They keep things clean but still feel better not having to step around bare foot. The slippers are non-slip and super light weight. They dry nearly completely dry by simply wiping away water with a towel. The material feels similar to crocs. I wear 9.5 men's shoe size and the size 9 is snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before purchase and ordered a size larger as a result. Sizes do run on the smaller side so I would suggest you order up as well. They work well for shower sandals as they don't hold much water and do dry pretty quickly as others have stated. My only compliant is that my left sandal has a small hole (not all the way through, but a manufacturing defect) which may hold a little bit of water itself. Probably could send it back to be replaced but I didn't think it was necessary and needed to use them right away. They work well for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a shower shoe
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are exactly as described. They are a bit uncomfortable in the toe area but since I only use them once in a while for public showers, they will work. I like being able to just towel dry them and they are dry enough for my gym bag. Not a bad shoe, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, I wasn't expecting much—they cost ~$8. But I wasn't expecting pain. Hard as rock, and the post is too thick to it pushes your toes apart. Just about anything would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Bill the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit But Good Shower Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the shower at the gym, so I was not looking to wear them for extended periods of time. They work fine as a shower sandal, however they are tight and a bit uncomfortable. If you are looking to get these as a more permanent sandal, I would recommend getting a 1/2 size larger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Basic shower sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I wouldn't get athlete's foot in public showers. They have served their purpose. They have no stylish value, they are not comfortable and I doubt if I walk with them outside of bathrooms that they would hold up. Nice cheap sandals
customer_reviews.author: Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoe did order a size larger like other reviews suggested I didn’t like that the size 13 wasn’t part of prime and I had to pay for delivery that sucked because all the other sizes were prime and if they didn’t run small I could have ordered his size without paying extra.
customer_reviews.author: Nobo419

customer_reviews.title: Good shower flip flops for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot, size 11, and sometimes have to size up to a 12 to get the width I need but I had no problem with the 11 here - fits comfortably. they also dry pretty quickly, which is handy for packing them up into my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: MadeInDetroit

customer_reviews.title: Great shower shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shower shoes. My son loves these for his dorm at college. They fit great. I got a half size larger than his regular shoe size and they fit perfectly. He wears a 9 1/2 and I ordered a size 10
customer_reviews.author: N.  Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym shower sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect for the gym. Don't expect to wear these out for hours they aren't too comfortable but if you use them just for the gym or to shower then they couldnt be any better! They dry almost completely by the time I have to pack them back in my gym bag. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shower Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these sandals. Yes, they are excellent shower clogs, but so comfy that I would have no problem using them for casual wear at home. I got a size 10 for my size 9 wide feet and the fit was great. Apparently the plastic smell problem has been fixed. At least I didn't encounter any. After reading some posts, I had to smell them close-up and barely detected any odor. (My sniffer works good, BTW). At the low price, I was impressed to receive a quality item that did the job. Thanks Vertico!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. McGleish

customer_reviews.title: These work great for gym shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: These work great for gym shower shoes. They are thin and light, and provide better traction than a cheap big box store flip flop. I wouldn't want to wear these otherwise, but they work great for the 5 minute gym shower.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it's for
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great for shower sandals. They dry quickly and are easy to slip on. I had to file down the seam a little near the toe, but otherwise they work great as shower sandals. I would not wear these for an extended period of time, that's not what they are for!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fine for shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell. A bit stiff, and as I have a high instep they fit a bit snug, although I ordered one size up. ( I wear a 9, ordered a size 10.) Perhaps will loosen up a bit with wear. Fine for shower shoes, just not real comfortable for long term wear such as Teva Mush, etc..... although as they are rubber, I do not expect them to get as "funky" as other flip-flops that are more comfortable. Appear durable, and should last. Three stars because they are ok, but not what I would consider great compared to something that can be purchased locally for less at big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them they were stiff and had a little extra material around the sides. the band next to the toe kept rubbing into me and feltlike it would cut into me but I just gave it a small trim and delt with it. I eventually decided to use them on the treadmill to break them in and now they fit perfectly. As in no cutting into my foot or nothing. If you asked me if they were worth buying I would say..... yes, yes they were. I hope this helps you out because in the end it's your decision to make.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SHOWER Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a perfect companion to use at the gym. It is a molded piece of rubbery plastic that keeps my bare foot off the floor while also providing grip to the slippery floor. I would not wear this sandal as a casual flip flop - for that is not what it was designed.
customer_reviews.author: Desertman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are very nice, I like them. They seem really stiff, but maybe as I break them in they will be more comfortable. I am a retired soldier, so I just adapt. We shall see on my next review as time pass, but other then that I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Sidronio Z. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and functional
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were cheap and relatively comfortable. The fit is pretty accurate and they serve their purpose in dorm / gym-like settings. The design doesn't drain water water very effectively, so I sort of wish they either had raised bumps or some holes so you're feet wouldn't squish around after you've left the shower area. All-in-all not a bad buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had these sandals for over two years and I couldn't have been more happy with a cheap sandal. They were comfortable and never felt loose on my foot. My dog decided it was a chew toy and destroyed them, I will be buying again. Perfect for locker room, or slipping on to go I'm the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Colten Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Work as designed to, what more can you say? Oh just purchased two more pair  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the shower, very well put together, I just purchased two more pair they are that good. I love the way they are all one piece not two or more pieces fitted together. They fit so well in in 9.5 foot. Good Job Vertico, keep up the quality and you will sale many more of these.
customer_reviews.author: JJP Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for water. They are one piece rubber. Well made...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8 in flip flops. They are a little loose fitting but in that, maybe they will be easier to slip on and off at the Gym in the shower while soaping up. I'm just used to flip flops that hug my feet. These don't. Nonetheless, I am pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Works and well fit.
customer_reviews.text: Works as directed and is comfortable. I have a wide large foot for a lady. Size 10 fits perfect. It's comfortable. Just wipe them out when you are done and pat the bottoms dry with a towel. They dried quickly. Woukd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: IboughtfromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy so far. I use it as a shower shoe for my gym...it does that weird thing some of these kinds of shoes do where it actually suctions to your foot when it gets wet...makes for some comical noises walking around. Aside from that a good purchase and I think they'll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First they smell god awful but that fades in a few weeks. They are uncomfortable as any Sandal I’ve ever put on. These are true shower sandals and not made for walking. For the price they work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Crawford

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: A stiffer, harder plastic so not overly comfortable, but they do dry easier & won't absorb water. For the short time you wear these in a locker room, they do just fine without spending much.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S

customer_reviews.title: Strap cut my foot
customer_reviews.text: After using this for one day, the top straps cut the top of my foot. Perhaps its the material, but I did not expect to have the strop scrape the top skin of both of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.C.U.

customer_reviews.title: Too small sizes vary
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes about two years ago and I love them. I ordered two new pair over last month or so and just tried them on. They are same size and now they are too small. Now in order to get my money refunded , I have to pay 8 dollars to ship them back for a refund. This is ridiculous. I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great for college kids who use dorm showers
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Inexpensive for the amount of time they last (six months and counting). The WalMart two dollar ones kept falling apart after a few weeks. These are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great for GYM ,  Shower and Jaccuzi
customer_reviews.text: Great for GYM , Shower and Jaccuzi Where you expect it to get WET. But NOT , a walk around Slipper outside. Does not even come close to my walk around Island Slippers brand. In Hawaii , we wear a LOT of Slippers. (that's Flip Flops to you) :)
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii-Geek

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good value because the price is so low. They run a little small and the thing that goes between the toes is rough and too wide making them uncomfortable to wear for more than a few minutes. I only need them for the shower so they're ok. If I had paid more than usd 10, I would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Use for Shower Only
customer_reviews.text: I put these sandals on immediately before I get in the shower, and take them off when I get out (at the gym). For this purpose, they work great, and I will continue to use them. However, walking around in them for more than five minutes was painful. I would recommend to use them in the shower only.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: a bit larger and with left pieces of mold residues uncut
customer_reviews.text: is good product but a bit larger than expected and most importantly had to use scissors to cut excess plastic and trim molding residues of the manufacturing its not well finished.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: They were true to size and for an all rubber like sandal they're very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews I purchased these sandals to be used specifically as shower sandals at the gym. They were true to size and for an all rubber like sandal they're very comfortable. I have had no problems with slipping when wet. They dry quickly and are back in the gym bag. One comment worth noting is that they arrive in a sealed bag and have a slight plastic smell as others have noted in reviews but they air out fairly quick. Overall I am very pleased with the this purchase.if your looking for a good shower sandal I do recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, too small, Lacks quality control!
customer_reviews.text: Lacks quality control. Ordered twice, because first time thought there had been a mistake on my part with the size order but the second time there was still an error. There is a glitch on their part that should be fixed. Sandals were too small so had to give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vertico - Rubber Shower Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife. She loves the slippers and she has found comfort on her tired feet. She would recommend it to everyone. Actually I am ready to buy one pair for myself. Soft and flexible to touch and as I already said very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size 12 is small/snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them in the shower yet. But I can tell already that they fit awfully tight. The rubber smell is present I hope that it goes away after a little bit. I hope the snugness helps me not slip in the gym, showers..
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as shower shoes for the gym and they're great...dry quickly. I would not recommend these for everyday wear. They do run small. I normally wear a 10.5, but ordered a 12 based on others reviews and I'm glad I did. 12 fits great. Anything less would've been too small.
customer_reviews.author: FullHouseOfCards

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR MY FOOT
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is different, but these did not fit me well. The strap between the toes is hard rubber and not comfortable. There is no cushion support in the bottom part of the Sandel. The upper foot supports are also hard rubber. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Skydriver

customer_reviews.title: There are some excess items that hurt my foot
customer_reviews.text: There are excess items such as rubber that were not removed and so my feet got hurt. It is good if not for the excess rubber. It also fits well as described.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

product_meta.title: Vertico - Rubber Shower Flip Flops | Quick Dry, Lightweight Protection Sandals
feature_bullets: BUILT FOR TRAVELING: The Vertico Shower Sandal is made to be a lightweight, quick drying travel companion for use in hotel showers and other public bathing houses.

EXCELLENT PROTECTION: The closed-cell EVA construction reduces the amount of water absorbed that many "flip-flops" are guilty of. Using our sandals can help reduce the chance of: Ringworm, Athletes Foot, and Other Shower Fungi.

SLIP RESISTANT: Not much is worse than slick locker room floors. As long as you have a pair of Vertico Flip Flops then that will not be a worry. A must have for showers, pools, and locker rooms alike.

VERTICO: The Brand You Can Trust. We design each pair of shoes with the customer in mind. There is no need to have reservations about buying with us because we always make sure the customer is satisfied.
